第53届卡罗维发利国际电影节(2018)
　　水晶地球仪奖 特别提名奖 索尼娅·普罗森茨
　　水晶地球仪奖(提名) 索尼娅·普罗森茨

writer.name: 索尼娅·普罗森茨 Sonja Prosenc

director.name: 索尼娅·普罗森茨 Sonja Prosenc

introduction: Seventeen-year-old Iva is in the process of coming to terms with the death of her mother. Influenced by this deep personal loss and by the discovery that she didn’t know everything about her mom, the girl slowly immerses herself into a strange, almost dreamlike world. Sonja Prosenc’s movie is dominated by a distinctive poetic that attacks the viewer’s senses, as well as by a narratively loose style and an ability to construct a story with the aid of the subtlest of suggestions.
